rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Dan is an absolute scream.  If you're a guy and have a fair talent for singing, join Glee.  You absolutely will not regret it.
Great professor and great guy.  He really challenges everybody to improve their singing and doesn't take mediocrity, but he always makes singing fun.  Great guy, guy group... join choir!

Probably the best professor I've ever had.  He really cares about his students and makes music fun.  If you want to take a music class that will help you in every aspect of your life, take one with him!
